title: Challenger rewards info, help!
body: This year there are 3 types of challenger icons again and im just wondering what rank you have to be in the different queues to get the different icons. I can imagine that the teir 3 icon is only for the top teams and players, perhabs only for the people who earns the jackets, but where is the line between teir 2 and teir 1? If anyone could tell me it would be greatly appreciated, both in soloQ but also in 3v3 and 5v5, thanks :)

replies.body:
The Challenger Icon has two different sets: One set for players in challenger but *not* in the top ladder. The second set is for players that *are* in the top ladder **and** in challenger. Each set consists of 3 icons, one for solo rating, one for 2s and 3s, then one for full teams of 5 rating.

Surrender at 20 has a pretty good article detailing the icons and what they look like that you can find [here.](http://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/10/1018-pbe-update.html) Let me know if you have any other questions.

Im a little confused, you say there are two different sets of icons, but according to surrender@20 there are 3 sets, 9 icons in total. From my understanding the different icons are from the different gamemodes, ranked soloq/duoq/dynamicq in the lower ratings, 3v3 and 5v5. The emblem you got in the normal ranked mode has nothing to do with the rewards do they? Sorry if i misunderstood something.

Thanks for your reply :)

Since I'm not on the teams that design these rewards, and we don't have an official post or announcement up about this, I was purely speculating based off what previous seasons have shipped and some of the information on that Surrender at 20 post. 

I suggest waiting until we have concrete information out in an official post up on the [News Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/).
I hope someone has an answer for me? :3
